greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Table T(n,k) by antidiagonals of value of largest power of k-th prime which divides n.
example: a(12,2)=4 since 4=2^2 divides 12 but 8=2^3 does not.
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Mar 14 2001
